channel.title: [Help] Static IP issues
channel.description:
Hey guys. I'm having an issue with setting a Static IP. I'm using this tutorial: [url=http://portforward.com/networking/static-win7.htm]http://portforward.com/networking/static-win7.htm[/url]
Whenever I try to look at my network connections, it just shows a completely blank screen.
What mine looks like: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/34ypdue.png[/img] What it should look like: [img]http://portforward.com/networking/win7_staticip_change_adapter_properties.jpg[/img]
_____________________________
I have no idea as to why nothing is showing up. Another problem, that might be related to this one, is my laptop not being able to connect wirelessly. I have to be plugged into the router directly for it to work. It's just this laptop that has this issue as well. I've tried to update the drivers, but they never install correctly.
Any ideas and/or suggestions are much appreciated! <3

item.title: [Help] Static IP issues
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I know nothing on this matter but I’d say the problem is more likely windows than anything else and when it comes to customer support for windows the only help you get is on microsofts crappy forums :/. Ofc i might be wrong, its just a guess from what it looks like.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Static IP issues
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“TimeBroken, post:5, topic:433653”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=536372.msg3922264#msg3922264 date=1329844530]

Windows 7 or Vista?

Does the network appear in the bottom right of your taskbar as connected?

w7. And no it doesn’t.

Are you sure you’re connected?
[/quote]

I wouldn’t be able to type this to you if I wasn’t.[/quote]
Sneaky. Hm, can’t say I’ve ever had this problem before, even when I connect by ethernet the network always shows up, maybe google would be a better option? See if anyone has the same problem?

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Static IP issues
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

Hey guys. I’m having an issue with setting a Static IP.
I’m using this tutorial: http://portforward.com/networking/static-win7.htm

Whenever I try to look at my network connections, it just shows a completely blank screen.

What mine looks like:

34ypdue.png865×603

What it should look like:

I have no idea as to why nothing is showing up. Another problem, that might be related to this one, is my laptop not being able to connect wirelessly. I have to be plugged into the router directly for it to work. It’s just this laptop that has this issue as well. I’ve tried to update the drivers, but they never install correctly.

Any ideas and/or suggestions are much appreciated! <3

Read full topic
